basic.color: Flower color white, fruit color green, white

maintenance.soil: Soil with loose texture or soil with specific nutrients, pH value between 6-6.5
maintenance.sunlight: Like sunshine, slight shade tolerance, high quality fruits in sunny places
maintenance.watering: Likes wet environments, not resistant to drought, water thoroughly when soil is dry, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: Like fertilizer very much, apply more fertilizer during fruiting time
maintenance.pruning: Remove aged tissues, dead, rotten, diseased leaves timely and harvest tender fruit about 20 days after flowering
